foundation.description: Strip footing foundation with minimum depth of 1.2m and width of 0.6m. Must be constructed with reinforced concrete having minimum strength of 25 MPa.

external.description: External walls must be constructed with double-brick cavity wall construction. Minimum thickness of 230mm including cavity. Must achieve minimum fire rating of 60 minutes.

internal.description: Internal load-bearing walls to be minimum 115mm thick brick construction. Non-load bearing walls may be lightweight construction.

main.description: Main structural beams to be reinforced concrete with minimum depth of 400mm. Must be designed for imposed loads according to building use.

main_supply.description: Main electrical supply to be 3-phase 100A. Must include main circuit breaker and surge protection.

lighting.description: Lighting to achieve minimum 300 lux at working plane. Emergency lighting required in corridors and exits.

water_supply.description: Water supply to maintain minimum 350 kPa pressure. Hot water system must be solar with electric backup.

bedroom.description: Bedrooms must have minimum floor area of 9.0 m² and minimum width of 2.4m. Natural ventilation required with openable windows.

bathroom.description: Bathrooms to be fully waterproofed with minimum floor area of 3.0 m². Mechanical ventilation required if no external window.

corridors.description: Corridors to have minimum clear width of 1.0m. Fire escape routes require minimum 1.2m width.
